projects.title: Roomie AI: Smart Guest Companion
projects.summary: An AI concierge that automates in-stay requests and routes tickets intelligently.

details.problem: Guests wait for basic requests; ops lacks context.
details.solution: LLM that classifies & routes tickets with live status to guests.
details.architecture: Next.js + Python API + Redis + OpenAI + MySQL
details.learnings: Prompt compression, cost control, on-call fallbacks.

projects.title: FinScan: Receipt Auditor
projects.summary: OCR + anomaly detection for expense receipts.

details.solution: ML pipeline to flag outliers and duplicates.

projects.title: GreenTrack: Carbon Footprint Monitor
projects.summary: Real-time carbon tracking for daily activities with AI recommendations.

details.problem: Lack of awareness about personal carbon footprint.
details.solution: Mobile app with IoT integration and ML-based recommendations.

projects.title: CodeMentor: AI Pair Programming Assistant
projects.summary: VS Code extension for context-aware code suggestions and debugging.

details.problem: Developers struggle with complex debugging and code reviews.
details.solution: AI-powered extension that learns from codebase patterns.

projects.title: HealthPulse: Telemedicine Platform
projects.summary: Secure video consultation platform with AI symptom checker.

details.problem: Limited access to healthcare in remote areas.
details.solution: WebRTC-based platform with HIPAA-compliant data handling.

projects.title: AutoDeploy: CI/CD Orchestrator
projects.summary: Intelligent deployment orchestration with rollback automation.

details.problem: Manual deployment processes prone to errors.
details.solution: Automated pipeline with health checks and smart rollbacks.
